data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: If you had studied a little harder, you might have passed the test. I ____ you ____ that ____ is ____ for ____. But I think ____ had ____ much ____ in ____ knowledge ____ this ____. You should take the next exam more seriously.
data.partBlankContent: If you had studied a little harder, you might have passed the test. I kn__ you th___ that ma__ is ea__ for y__. But I think y__ had t__ much tr___ in yo__ knowledge o_ this to___. You should take the next exam more seriously.
data.fullContent: If you had studied a little harder, you might have passed the test. I know you think that math is easy for you. But I think you had too much trust in your knowledge of this topic. You should take the next exam more seriously.
data.answer: 如果你再努力一点，你就可能通过考试了。我知道你觉得数学对你来说很容易。但是我认为你太相信自己对这个话题的了解了。你应该更认真地对待下一次考试。
